question:
The coastal town of Mamallapuram is set to host the upcoming India-China Informal summit. In this context, consider the following statements about the summits’ destinations:
  1. Mamallapuram is an UNESCO World Heritage Site.
  2. Wuhan is designated as ‘Creative City’ by UNESCO.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is correct: It is a coastal town in Chennai, Tamil Nadu. It is an ancient seaport, dated back to 1st millennium CE. It is an UNESCO World Heritage Site. Some of its monuments include cave sanctuaries/ mandapas, ratha temples (resembles chariots), rock reliefs, etc. Statement 2 is correct: Wuhan was the site of the first Indo-China informal summit. It is a city in central China. It was declared a ‘Creative City’ by UNESCO in 2017. This designation is a part of UNESCO Creative Cities Network project. This project seeks to promote creativity as a component of urban development.
